title: The Really Longest Day
description: Phil and Bernice arrive for their first day at their new job, taking care of five juvenile delinquents with no other place to stay.

title: The Car
description: When Mike 'borrows' Fish's car without permission, he has the kid arrested for theft.

title: Power Play
description: When Victor suddenly starts waving money around, Fish discovers him to be a bag man for betting cards.

title: Cold Cash
description: With no budget to work with, it looks like a long cold winter without any heat.

title: Fish's Job
description: Fish applies for a job working security at a million dollar facility.

title: Bernice's Problem
description: Bernice decides to visit a psychiatrist; Victor gets tutored in English by a pretty classmate.

title: The Neighbors
description: When the neighbors begin to boycott the kids, Fish decides to hold an 'open house' to show them how wrong they are about his delinquent charges.

title: Fire
description: Detective Arthur Dietrich from the 12th Precinct drops by for lunch as Fish wonders if Victor has become a dangerous firebug.

title: The Social Worker
description: A psychiatrist from social welfare drops by to investigate the group home dynamic.

title: Fish and Roots
description: When Loomis questions where he came from, Charlie invites over an exchange student from Africa who puts the boy in touch with his ROOTS.

title: Anniversary
description: Mr. and Mrs. Fish plan to celebrate their 38th wedding anniversary on the same night Diane has her first date.

title: The Adoption
description: The Lesters decide to solve their childless situation by adopting one of the kids from the group home.

title: The New Kid
description: Loomis clashes with a new arrival at the group home, both younger and shorter than he is.

title: Close Encounters of the Fishy Kind
It Shouldn't Happen to a Dog
